item.title: ‘Barrio Triste’ Director Stillz on the Personal History Behind His Found Footage Crime Epic and How Making Bad Bunny’s Music Videos Fuels His Creativity — TIFF
item.description: “Barrio Triste” follows four lawless young men in Medellín, Colombia in the ’90s who steal a television camera and document robberies, crime and the unrelenting pace of street violen
